posts.text:
Til sölu forláta skjástandur frá ErgoTron
Highlights
Monitor height and angle can be positioned for maximum comfort
Monitors can be installed portrait or landscape mode
Integrated Cable management system organizes and routes cables
VESA® MIS-D compliant for monitors with 100/75 hole pattern
Easy-to-use with simple installation and effortless operation
Overview
Simultaneously hold, lift and tilt up to three flat panel LCD monitors on a single base using the LX Triple Display Lift Stand from Ergotron®. This stand allows the monitors to lift and tilt in tandem to maintain position integrity with just a touch of the hand. Besides, by utilizing CF lift-and-pivot motion technology, this stand provides up to 5 inch of effortless height adjustability. Moreover, this VESA® MIS-D compliant stand enables you to view multiple documents simultaneously ensuring the utmost productivity and accuracy in any work environment.
Kostar 50.250.kr. hjá Advania 
Fæst á hálfvirði
Sjá hér : 
https://www.advania.is/vefverslun/vara/?productid=91ab8b75-1d9f-4c20-a9a8-d3f403ab7f30
